readable.title: 2845246160_d0d1bbd6f0
readable.content: A man in a hat and red shirt aims a cellphone at a person walking toward him on the sidewalk . A man in a red sweatshirt and a hat is looking at his phone while another man in black walks closer to him down the sidewalk . A man in a red sweatshirt and a straw hat uses a cellphone . A man in a straw hat shades his phone while others walk on a busy sidewalk . A man with a hat taking a photo with his camera , while a passerby looks annoyed .
